rides.name: Elmo's Go-Go Skateboard
rides.description: Lively ride where guests skate through a vibrant course with loops and ramps, joining Elmo and friends for a fun-filled adventure.

rides.name: Cookie Monster Slide
rides.description: Playful slide where guests zip down a sweet-themed course, enjoying a tasty adventure with Cookie Monster himself.

rides.name: Yoshi's Adventure
rides.description: Join Yoshi on a whimsical adventure filled with lush landscapes, playful obstacles, and joyful surprises for an unforgettable experience.

rides.name: Jurassic Park - The Ride
rides.description: Join the expedition to encounter majestic dinosaurs, navigate turbulent waters, and experience heart-pounding excitement in this iconic attraction.

rides.name: Hollywood Dream - The Ride
rides.description: Feel the rush as you soar through Hollywood's skyline, twist through thrilling loops, and experience the ultimate blockbuster thrill ride in this high-speed adventure.

rides.name: Flight Of The Hippogriff
rides.description: Join Hagrid on a whimsical journey over the grounds of Hogwarts Castle, experiencing the thrill of flight and the wonder of the wizarding world in this spellbinding adventure.

rides.name: Freeze Ray Sliders
rides.description: Join the brave explorers on a chilling adventure, navigating twists, turns, and frozen surprises in this exhilarating winter-themed experience.

rides.name: Despicable Me Minion Mayhem
rides.description: Board the Minion transformation vehicle for a chaotic journey through Gru's lair, filled with laughter, unexpected twists, and interactive mayhem that's fun for the whole family.

rides.name: Space Fantasy - The Ride
rides.description: Join the space explorers on a thrilling journey filled with dazzling lights, futuristic technology, and heart-pounding excitement in this epic space fantasy experience.

rides.name: Mario Kart Koopa Challenge
rides.description: Join Mario and friends in a thrilling competition against Bowser, using power-ups and dodging obstacles in a high-speed adventure that's fun for all ages.

rides.name: Big Bird's Big Nest
rides.description: Join in the playground where visitors can explore towering nests, slide down giant slides, and embark on playful adventures with Big Bird and friends.

rides.name: Hello Kitty Ribbon Collection
rides.description: Join Hello Kitty and her friends on a delightful journey through colorful landscapes, interactive displays, and enchanting activities that celebrate friendship and creativity.
